abstract: Updated at 4 p.m. The court-appointed trustee overseeing the liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff’s investment firm said Friday that the disgraced financier did not buy any securities for his clients in the last 13 years.
lead_paragraph: Updated at 4 p.m. The court-appointed trustee overseeing the liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff’s investment firm said Friday that the disgraced financier did not buy any securities for his clients in the last 13 years.

headline.main: Trustee Says Madoff’s Firm Bought No Securities
